channel.title: CVE Feed for Go standard library -- crypto/internal/nistec
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Go standard library -- crypto/internal/nistec

item.title: CVE-2023-24532|2024-08-02T10:56:04.340Z -- go%20standard%20library -- crypto%2Finternal%2Fnistec
item.description: The ScalarMult and ScalarBaseMult methods of the P256 Curve may return an incorrect result if called with some specific unreduced scalars (a scalar larger than the order of the curve). This does not impact usages of crypto/ecdsa or crypto/ecdh.
